meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive James Cross Melanie Hess Mike Shapiro Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6695.

td.p: James Cross, a graduate student of computer science originally from Auburn, Alabama
Melanie Hess, a technical editor from Lancaster, Pennsylvania
Mike Shapiro, an actuary from Denver, Colorado (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,401)

tr.td: GET YOUR KICKS
"C" IN AMERICAN HISTORY
GRAPE JAM
STATE OF THE BOOK
TRANSLATE THE LYRIC FROM LATIN
ONE EXTRA LETTER
(Alex: Each response will be two words, but one has an extra letter.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Mike
Melanie
James
GET YOUR KICKS
(Alex: But a different category than the first round.)
1960s NEWSMAKERS
CEREMONIES
CHINA TOWNS
GILBERT & SULLIVAN
JEOPARDY! IN 3-D

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Mike] [*], by Hermann Hesse.)

$15,101
Siddhartha')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
